obscene.translation[0].definitions[0].de: relating to sex in a way that is shocking and offensive
obscene.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: obscene phone calls  (=calls from an unknown person saying obscene things)
obscene.translation[0].definitions[1].de: extremely unfair, immoral, or unpleasant, especially in a way that makes you angry
obscene.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Some players earn obscene amounts of money.
